description: Lemony baked salmon works perfectly with rich and creamy leeks and peas for a simple midweek dinner.
keywords: Fish dishes,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon with Creamy Leeks & Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Place the salmon fillets in a lightly oiled roasting tin, squeeze over lemon juice, cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes.
Heat the rest of the oil in a frying pan and cook the leeks and potatoes for 2-3 minutes. Add 2 tablespoons of water, place the lid on and cook for 10 minutes, until tender.
Stir in the peas, mustard and cream and cook for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the parsley and serve with salmon fillets on top.
